name: Bill Russell
description: 6'10" center, 11 NBA championships - most in history. 5x MVP. First Black head coach in major American sports. Civil rights pioneer who played through racism in Boston. The ultimate winner who built dynasties through defense and leadership.

championship-banners.name: Eleven Banners
championship-banners.description: Standing beneath the championship banners he created
championship-banners.prompt: standing tall with eleven championship banners visible above or behind - dignified pride without arrogance, the man who built a dynasty, representing unmatched winning

block-rejection.name: The Block
block-rejection.description: Signature blocked shot - changing the game defensively
block-rejection.expression: protective intensity, not in my house
block-rejection.prompt: emphatically blocking shot at the rim - arm extended high, body positioned perfectly, the defensive genius who invented rim protection, timing perfected

outlet-pass.name: Outlet Pass
outlet-pass.description: Grabbing rebound and firing outlet to start fast break
outlet-pass.expression: quick thinking, seeing the whole floor
outlet-pass.prompt: grabbing rebound and immediately firing outlet pass - eyes up court, ball leaving hands to start fast break, the rebounder who started the Celtics' running game

player-coach.name: Player-Coach
player-coach.description: First Black head coach - leading while playing
player-coach.prompt: on sideline or court in dual role - clipboard or pointing to direct players, the player-coach who broke barriers, leading while still competing at highest level

civil-rights-stance.name: Standing for Justice
civil-rights-stance.description: The activist who used his platform for change
civil-rights-stance.prompt: standing with dignified defiance - the athlete who stood for civil rights, who played through hatred in Boston, who refused to sign autographs as protest, principled and unbowed

defensive-positioning.name: Defensive Genius
defensive-positioning.description: Perfect positioning - seeing plays before they happen
defensive-positioning.prompt: in perfect defensive position - body angled to cut off lane, eyes reading offense, the defensive genius who saw plays develop before they happened, positioning over athleticism
